meaning: day, sun, Japan, counter for days

onyomiExamples.meaning: Sunday, day (of the month), counter for days, Japan
resistance against Japanese aggression, anti-Japanese (campaign, movement, etc.)

sun and moon, time, days and months, years, Sunday and Monday

kunyomiExamples.meaning: day, days, sun, sunshine, sunlight, (the) day, daytime, daylight, date, deadline, (past) days, time (e.g. of one's childhood), case (esp. unfortunate), event
